attributes.description:
The Peugeot 3008 1.6T Allure Auto is powerful, super responsive and the practical agility of its engine is designed to generate maximum torque to ensure drive power and fuel economy. It is equipped with various technology systems making your driving experience even more pleasurable.
This vehicle comes with a 5 year or 100 000kms warranty and a 5 year or 100 000kms service plan. Trade ins welcome and in house finance can be arranged.
